report.title: LuxBio: Sites Outside Square Check Report
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Location module on MNHNL/LuxBio forms to identify those Sites which have a centroid which is outside the boundary of their parent location.
report.query: SELECT l2.name as square, l.name as location_name, l.id as location_id, regexp_replace(l.centroid_sref, ',|\\.[0-9]*' , '', 'g') as xy FROM locations l INNER JOIN locations l2 ON (l2.id = l.parent_id AND ST_Within(l.centroid_geom, l2.boundary_geom) = FALSE) WHERE l.deleted = FALSE AND l.location_type_id IN (#primary_loc_type_id#, #secondary_loc_type_id#) #order_by#

param.name: primary_loc_type_id
param.description: Term ID for the Location Type used to indicate primary locations:

param.name: secondary_loc_type_id
param.description: Term ID for the Location Type used to indicate secondary locations:
